fields.Title: <p>I continued my work with individual companies on workforce development, and analysis of the operating procedures and software applications. I also continued my work with Procore Construction Management software to develop training content for its use by universities and industry. I further continued my work developing educational with ENR magazine developing educational content for use by AEC university students. Working with educators at several universities, I developed a qualitative / quantitative survey to assess the value of the Engineering News Record (ENR) Magazine educational content. The results of the survey were used to write a conference paper that has been accepted for publication and presentation at the Associated Schools of Construction (ASC) 2024 International Conference.</p>
